marytts.unitselection.select.viterbi
Class ViterbiPoint

java.lang.Object
  marytts.unitselection.select.viterbi.ViterbiPoint

public class ViterbiPoint
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a point in the Viterbi path. A point corresponds to an item, e.g. a Segment. Each ViterbiPoint knows about its next ViterbiPoint, i.e. they can form a queue.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a ViterbiPoint for the given target.

getPaths

public java.util.List<ViterbiPath> getPaths()
Gets the sorted set containting the paths of the candidates of this point, sorted by score. getPaths().first() will return the path with the lowest score, i.e. the best path.

Returns:
a sorted set.
